display.title: Acceptable Powerful Enchants
display.description: In order to attune a Weapon/Tool to a Heart of Affinity you must use a powerful Enchanted Book, this will also dictate the activiation requirment for the Affinity effect. Attuning can be done using Infinity, Multishot, Vanishing Curse, Power V, Protection IV, Sharpness V, Smite V, Impaling V, Swift Sneak III, Soul Speed III or Thorns III
